Salvador Medina

UGA Keychain

October 1, 2014

This is a 3D printed model of the University of Georgia’s “G” logo that was made for UGA’s Art Education event as a part of Experience UGA.

Nearly a hundred keychains were 3D printed to give to middle and high school students exploring the intersection of art and science. The model is fully scalable and can be downloaded and printed from the Thingiverse post.
